name: Dual-Weapon Reload
summary: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.
description:
You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons. You Interact to reload a one-handed ranged weapon you're holding. Unlike most Interact actions, you don't need a free hand to reload your ranged weapon in this way.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
